schema.description: Updates the global reward index for the specified reward tokens or all of the specified ones if None. Funds may be sent along with this.

items.description:
Represents the type of an fungible asset

Each **asset info** instance can be one of three variants:

- Native SDK coins. To create an **asset info** instance of this type, provide the denomination. - CW20 tokens. To create an **asset info** instance of this type, provide the contract address. - CW1155 tokens. To create an **asset info** instance of this type, provide the contract address and token ID.

schema.title: Update global indexes
